[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/block_storage/mod.rs] [Function: get_block()] [Block reference lifetime] Does get_block() return Arc<PipelinedBlock> guarantee the block remains valid even if pruned, or can it return a block that becomes invalid causing use-after-free style bugs? (High)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/block_storage/mod.rs] [Function: ordered_root()] [Root consistency] Can ordered_root() return a block that is ahead of commit_root() in a way that violates consensus invariants, allowing uncommitted state to be treated as committed? (Critical)
